GE07bhg4c04u:23: avyayam avyaya-veda-mūlatvād avyaya-phalatvāc ca na vyeti sva-phalād ity avyayam avyabhicāri-phalam
GE07bhg4c04u:24: tathā caitādṛśena balādhānaṃ śakyam iti bhāvaḥ |

GE07bhg4c04u:117: etad dehānavacchinnasya tava dehāntarāvacchedena vādityaṃ pratyupadeṣṭṛtvam etad-dehena vā

GE07bhg4c04u:125: tad evaṃ dehāntareṇa sargādau sad-bhāvānupappattir ity asarvajñatvānityatvābhyāṃ dvāv arjunasya pūrva-pakṣau ||4||
GE07bhg4c04u:126: viśvanāthaḥ : uktam artham asambhavaṃ pṛcchati aparam idānīntanam |

GE07bhg4c04u:130: aparam arvācīnaṃ paraṃ parācīnaṃ tasmād ādhunikas tvaṃ prācīnāya vivasvate yogam uktavān ity etat katham ahaṃ vijānīyāṃ pratīyām |
GE07bhg4c04u:131: ayam arthaḥ : na khalu sarveśvaratvena kṛṣṇam arjuno na vetti tasya narākhya-tad-avatāratvena tādrūpyāt, paraṃ dhāma paraṃ dhāma ity ādi tad-ukteś ca |
GE07bhg4c04u:134: sarveśvaraḥ sa yathā sva-tattvaṃ vetti na tathānyaḥ |
GE07bhg4c04u:139: tac ca manuṣākṛti-para-brahmaṇas tava rūpaṃ janmādi ca loka-vilakṣaṇaṃ kiṃ-vidhaṃ
GE07bhg4c04u:140: kim-arthakaṃ kiṃ-kālam iti vijñasyāpy ājñavat praśno 'yam
GE07bhg4c04u:143: śrī-bhagavān uvāca bahūni me vyatītāni janmāni tava cārjuna |
GE07bhg4c04u:144: tāny ahaṃ veda sarvāṇi na tvaṃ vettha parantapa ||5||
GE07bhg4c04u:145: śrīdharaḥ : rūpāntareṇopadiṣṭavān ity abhiprāyeṇottaraṃ śrī-bhagavān uvāca bahūnīti |
GE07bhg4c04u:148: tvaṃ tu na vettha na vetsi avidyāvṛttatvāt ||5||
GE07bhg4c04u:149: madhusūdanaḥ : tatra sarvajñatvena prathamasya parihāram āha bahūnīti |
GE07bhg4c04u:150: janmāni līlā-deha-grahaṇāni loka-dṛṣṭy-abhiprāyeṇādityasyodayavan me mama bahūni vyatītāni tava cājñāninaḥ karmārjitāni deha-grahaṇāni |
GE07bhg4c04u:151: tava cety upalakṣaṇam itareṣām api jīvānāṃ, jīvaikyābhiprāyeṇa vā |
GE07bhg4c04u:154: tāni janmāny ahaṃ sarvajñaḥ sarva-śaktir īśvaro veda jānāmi sarvāṇi madīyāni tvadīyāny anyadīyāni ca |
GE07bhg4c04u:155: na tvam ajño jīvas tirobhūta-jñāna-śaktir vettha na jānāsi svīyāny api kiṃ punaḥ parakīyāṇi
GE07bhg4c04u:156: he parantapa ! paraṃ śatruṃ bheda-dṛṣṭyā parikalpya hantuṃ pravṛtto 'sīti viparīta-darśitatvād
GE07bhg4c04u:158: tad anena sambodhana-dvayenāvaraṇa-vikṣepau dvāv apy ajñāna-dharmau darśitau ||5||
GE07bhg4c04u:160: tava ceti yadā yadaiva mamāvatāras tadā mat-pārṣadatvāt tavāpy āvirbhāvo 'bhūd

GE07bhg4c04u:164: ataeva he parantapa ! sāmpratika-kuntī-putratvābhimāna-mātreṇaiva parān śatrūṃs tāpayasi
GE07bhg4c04u:165: baladevaḥ : eka evāhaṃ eko 'pi san bahudhā yo 'vabhāti ity ādi śruty-uktāni nitya-siddhāni bahūni rūpāṇi vaidūryavad ātmani dadhānaḥ purā

GE07bhg4c04u:360: śrutiś caivam āha ajāyamāno bahudhā vijāyate iti |
GE07bhg4c04u:361: smṛtiś ca pratyakṣaṃ ca harer janma na vikāraḥ kathaṃcana ity ādyā |
GE07bhg4c04u:366: māyā dambhe kṛpāyāṃ ca iti viśvaḥ |
GE07bhg4c04u:369: māyā vayunaṃ jñānaṃ ca iti nirghaṇṭu-koṣāt |

GE07bhg4c04u:375: harir deha-dehi-bhedena guṇa-guṇi-bhedena ca śūnyo 'pi viśeṣa-balāt
GE07bhg4c04u:378: yadā yadā hi dharmasya glānir bhavati bhārata |

GE07bhg4c04u:386: varṇāśrama-tad-ācāra-vyaṅgyasya yadā yadā glānir hānir bhavati he bhārata
GE07bhg4c04u:387: bharata-vaṃśodbhavatvena bhā jñānaṃ tatra ratatvena vā tvaṃ na
GE07bhg4c04u:389: evaṃ yadā yadābhyutthānam udbhavo 'dharmasya veda-niṣiddhasya nānā-vidha-duḥkha-sādhanasya
GE07bhg4c04u:390: dharma-virodhinas tadā tadātmānaṃ dehaṃ sṛjāmi nitya-siddham eva sṛṣṭam iva darśayāmi māyayā
GE07bhg4c04u:391: viśvanāthaḥ : kadā sambhavāmīty apekṣāyām āha yadeti |
GE07bhg4c04u:392: dharmasya glānir hānir adharmasyābhyutthānaṃ vṛddhis te dve soḍhum aśaknuvan tayor vaiparītyaṃ kartum iti bhāvaḥ |
GE07bhg4c04u:393: ātmānaṃ dehaṃ sṛjāmi nity siddham eva taṃ sṛṣṭam iva darśayāmi māyayā iti śrī-madhusūdana-sarasvatī-pādāḥ

GE07bhg4c04u:413_0: madhusūdanaḥ : tat kiṃ dharmasya hānir adharmasya ca vṛddhis tava paritoṣa-kāraṇaṃ yena tasminn eva kāla āvirbhavasīti tathā
GE07bhg4c04u:413_1: cānarthāvaha eva tavāvatāraḥ syāt ? iti nety āha paritrāṇāyeti dharma-hānyā
GE07bhg4c04u:414: hīyamānānāṃ sādhūnāṃ puṇya-kāriṇāṃ veda-mārga-sthānāṃ paritrāṇāya paritaḥ sarvato rakṣaṇāya

GE07bhg4c04u:420: viśvanāthaḥ : nanu tvad-bhaktā rājarṣayo brahmarṣayo 'pi vā
GE07bhg4c04u:422: etāvad artham eva kiṃ tavāvatāreṇa ? iti cet, satyam |
GE07bhg4c04u:423: anyad api anya-duṣkaraṃ karma kartuṃ sambhavāmīty āha parīti |
GE07bhg4c04u:432: mad-anyaiḥ pravartayitum aśakyaṃ samyak prakāreṇa sthāpayitum ity arthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c04u:438: tasya sa khalu nigraho 'py anugraha eva nirṇītaḥ ||8||
GE07bhg4c04u:440: adharmābhyutthānaṃ cāpanetuṃ prabhavanti tāvate 'rthāya kiṃ sambhavāmīty āha parīti |
GE07bhg4c04u:441: sādhūnāṃ mad-rūpa-guṇa-niratānāṃ mat-sākṣāt-kāram ākāṅkṣyatāṃ tena vinātivyagrāṇāṃ tad-vaiyagrya-rūpād
GE07bhg4c04u:443: tathā duṣkṛtāṃ duṣṭa-karma-kāriṇāṃ mad-anyair avadhyānāṃ daśagrīva-kaṃsādīnāṃ
GE07bhg4c04u:445: śuddha-bhakti-yogasya vaidikasyāpi mad-itaraiḥ pracārayitum aśakyasya saṃsthāpanārthāya sampracārāyety etat trayaṃ mat-sambhavasya kāraṇam iti |
GE07bhg4c04u:446: yuge yuge tat-tat-samayena ca duṣṭa-vadhena harau vaiṣamyaṃ, tena duṣṭānāṃ mokṣānanda-lābhe sati tasyānugraha-rūpatvena pariṇāmāt ||8||
GE07bhg4c04u:448: janma karma ca me divyam evaṃ yo vetti tattvataḥ |
GE07bhg4c04u:449: tyaktvā dehaṃ punar janma naiti mām eti so 'rjuna ||9||
GE07bhg4c04u:450: śrīdharaḥ : evaṃ-vidhānām īśvara-janma-karmaṇāṃ jñāne phalam āha janmeti |
GE07bhg4c04u:451: svecchayā kṛtaṃ mama janma karma ca dharma-pālana-rūpaṃ divyam alaukikaṃ tattvataḥ parānugrahārtham eveti yo vetti sa dehābhimānaṃ tyaktvā punar
GE07bhg4c04u:456: karma ca dharma-saṃsthāpanena jagat-paripālanaṃ me mama nitya-siddheśvarasya divyam aprākṛtam anyaiḥ kartum aśakyam īśvarasyaivāsādharaṇam |
GE07bhg4c04u:457: evam ajo 'pi sann ity ādinā pratipāditaṃ yo vetti
GE07bhg4c04u:460: garbha-vāsādi-rūpam eva janma sva-bhogārtham eva karmety āropitam |
GE07bhg4c04u:462: māyayā janmānukaraṇam akartur api parānugrahāya karmānukaraṇam iy evaṃ yo vetti sa ātmano 'pi tattva-sphuraṇāt tyaktvā deham imaṃ punar janma naiti
GE07bhg4c04u:463: | kintu māṃ bhagavantaṃ vāsudevam eva sac-cid-ānanda-ghanam eti saṃsārān mucyata ity arthaḥ
GE07bhg4c04u:464: viśvanāthaḥ : ukta-lakṣaṇasya maj-janmanas tathā janmānantaraṃ mat-karmaṇaś ca tattvato jñāna-mātreṇaiva kṛtārthaḥ syād ity āha janmeti |
GE07bhg4c04u:473: na vidyate yasya ca janma karma vā [BhP 8.3.8] ity atra śloke
GE07bhg4c04u:482: evaṃ yo vetti tattvata iti ajo
GE07bhg4c04u:483: 'pi sann avyayatātmā ity asmiṃs tathā janma karma ca me divyam ity asmiṃś

GE07bhg4c04u:485: yad vā tattvataḥ oṃ tat sad iti nirdeśo brahmaṇas trividhaḥ smṛtaḥ [Gītā 17.18]

GE07bhg4c04u:489: sa dehaṃ tyaktvā punar janma naiti kintu deham atyaktvaiva mām eti |

GE07bhg4c04u:497: bhavac ca bhaviṣyac ca eko devo nitya-līlānurakto bhakta-vyāpī bhakta-hṛdy
GE07bhg4c04u:498: antarātmā iti śrutyā divyam iti mad-uktyā ca dṛḍha-śraddho
GE07bhg4c04u:500: he arjuna ! sa vartamānaṃ dehaṃ tyaktvā punaḥ prāpañcikaṃ janma naiti |

GE07bhg4c04u:503: janma-karmaṇī tattvato brahmatvena yo vettīti vyākhyeyam |
GE07bhg4c04u:504: itarathā tam eva viditvātimṛtyum eti nānyaḥ panthā vidyate 'yanāya [ŚvetU 3.8] iti śrutir vyākupyet |
GE07bhg4c04u:511: śrīdharaḥ : kathaṃ janma-karma-jñānena tvat-prāptiḥ syād iti ? ata āha vīta-rāgeti |
GE07bhg4c04u:512: ahaṃ śuddha-sattvāvatāraiḥ dharma-pālanaṃ karomīti madīyaṃ parama-kāruṇikatvaṃ jñātvā |

GE07bhg4c04u:525: madhusūdanaḥ : mām eti so 'rjunety uktaṃ tatra svasya
GE07bhg4c04u:526: sarva-mukta-prāpyatayā puruṣārthatvam asya mokṣa-mārgasyānādi-parasparāgatatvaṃ ca darśayati vīta-rāgeti |
GE07bhg4c04u:529: sarvān viṣayān parityajya jñāna-mārge kathaṃ jīvitavyam iti trāso bhayam |
GE07bhg4c04u:531: kathaṃ hitaḥ syād iti dveṣaḥ krodhaḥ |
GE07bhg4c04u:532: ta ete rāga-bhaya-krodhā vītā vivekena vigatā yebhyas te vīta-rāga-bhaya-krodhāḥ śuddha-sattvāḥ

GE07bhg4c04u:544: viśvanāthaḥ : na kevalam eka evādhunika eva,
GE07bhg4c04u:545: maj-janma-karma-tattva-jñāna-mātreṇaiva māṃ prāpnoty api tu prāktanā api
GE07bhg4c04u:546: pūrva-pūrva-kalpāvatīrṇasya mama janma-karma-tattva-jñānavanto mām āpur evety āha vīteti
GE07bhg4c04u:548: 'nubhava-rūpam eva tapas tena pūtāḥ iti śrī-rāmānujācārya-caraṇāḥ |
GE07bhg4c04u:551: tathā ca śrī-rāmānuja-dhṛta-śrutiḥ - tasya dhīrāḥ parijānanti
GE07bhg4c04u:552: yoniṃ iti dhīrā dhīmanta eva tasya yoniṃ janma-prakāraṃ jānantīty arthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c04u:553: vītās tyaktāḥ kumata-prajalpiteṣu janeṣu rāgādyā yais te na teṣu rāgaḥ prītir nāpi tebhyo bhayaṃ nāpi teṣu krodho mad-bhaktānām ity arthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c04u:557: baladevaḥ : idānīm iva purāpi maj-janmādi-nityatā-jñānena bahūnāṃ vimuktir abhūd iti tan-nityatāṃ draḍhayitum āha vīteti |
GE07bhg4c04u:559: pūtāḥ santaḥ purā mad-bhāvam āgatā ity anuṣaṅgaḥ |
GE07bhg4c04u:561: duradhigama-śruti-yukti-sampādyatvāt tapas tasmin jñāne vā yad vividha-kumata-kutarkādi-nivāraṇa-rūpaṃ tapas tena pūtā nirdhūtāvidyā ity arthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c04u:562: mayi bhāvaṃ premāṇaṃ vidyamānatāṃ vā mat-sākṣāt-kṛtim |
GE07bhg4c04u:564: vītāḥ parityaktās tan-nityatva-virodhiṣu rāgādayo yais te, na teṣu rāgaṃ na bhayaṃ na ca krodhaṃ prakāśayantīty arthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c04u:565: tatra hetuḥ - man-mayā mad-eka-niṣṭhā upāśritāḥ saṃsevamānāḥ ||10||
GE07bhg4c04u:567: ye yathā māṃ prapadyante tāṃs tathaiva bhajāmy aham |
GE07bhg4c04u:569: śrīdharaḥ : nanu tarhi kiṃ tvayy api vaiṣamyam asti ? yad evaṃ tvad-eka-śaraṇānām evātmābhāvaṃ dadāsi nānyeṣāṃ sakāmānām iti |
GE07bhg4c04u:571: yathā yena prakāreṇa sakāmatayā niṣkāmatayā vā ye māṃ bhajante tān ahaṃ tathaiva tad-apekṣita-phala-dānena bhajāmi anugṛhṇāmi, na tu sakāmā
GE07bhg4c04u:572: māṃ vihāyendrādīn eva ye bhajante tān aham upekṣa iti mantavyam |
GE07bhg4c04u:573: yataḥ sarvaśaḥ sarva-prakārair indrādi-sevakā api mamaiva vartma bhajana-mārgam
GE07bhg4c04u:576: madhusūdanaḥ : nanu ye jñāna-tapasā pūtā niṣkāmās te tvad-bhāvaṃ
GE07bhg4c04u:577: gacchanti, ye tv apūtāḥ sakāmās te na gacchantīti phala-dātus tava
GE07bhg4c04u:578: vaiṣamya-nairghṛṇye syātām iti nety āha ye yatheti |
GE07bhg4c04u:579: ya ārtā arthārthino jijñāsavo jñāninaś ca yathā yena prakāreṇa sakāmatayā niṣkāmatayā ca mām īśvaraṃ sarva-phala-dātāraṃ prapadyante bhajanti tāṃs tathaiva
GE07bhg4c04u:580: tad-apekṣita-phala-dānenaiva bhajāmy anugṛhṇāmy ahaṃ na viparyayeṇa |
GE07bhg4c04u:583: jñāna-dānena jñāninaś ca mumukṣūn mokṣa-dānena na tv anya-kāmāyānyad
GE07bhg4c04u:585: nanu tathāpi sva-bhaktānām eva phalaṃ dadāsi na tv anya-deva-bhaktānām iti vaiṣamyaṃ sthitam eveti nety āha mama sarvātmano vāsudevasya vartma
GE07bhg4c04u:586: bhajana-mārgaṃ karma-jñāna-lakṣaṇam anuvartante he pārtha sarvajñaḥ
GE07bhg4c04u:587: sarva-prakārair indrādīn apy anuvartamānā manuṣyā iti karmādhikāriṇaḥ |
GE07bhg4c04u:588: indraṃ mitraṃ varuṇam agnim āhuḥ ity ādi-mantra-varṇāt phalam ata upapatteḥ [Vs. 3.2.38] iti nyāyāc ca sarva-rūpeṇāpi phala-dātā bhagavān eka evety arthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c04u:591: viśvanāthaḥ : nanu tvad-ekānta-bhaktāḥ kilataj-janma-karmaṇor nityatvaṃ manyanta eva |
GE07bhg4c04u:592: kecit tu jñānādi-siddhy-arthaṃ tvāṃ prapannā jñāni-prabhṛtayas tvaj-janma-karmaṇor nityatvaṃ nāpi manyanta iti tatrāha ya iti |
GE07bhg4c04u:593: yathā yena prakāreṇa māṃ prapadyante bhajante aham api tāṃs tenaiva prakāreṇa bhajāmi |
GE07bhg4c04u:595: ayam arthaḥ - ye mat-prabhor janma-karmaṇī nitye eveti manasi kurvāṇās
GE07bhg4c04u:596: tat-tal-līlāyām eva kṛta-manoratha-viśeṣā māṃ bhajantaḥ sukhayanty aham apīśvaratvāt kartum akartum anyathā kartum api samarthas teṣām api
GE07bhg4c04u:597: janma-karmaṇor nityatvaṃ kartuṃ tān sva-pārṣadīkṛtya taiḥ sārdham eva
GE07bhg4c04u:598: yathā-samayam avatarann antar dadhānaś ca tān pratikṣaṇam anugṛhṇann eva tad-bhajana-phalaṃ premāṇam eva dadāmi |
GE07bhg4c04u:600: maj-janma-karmaṇor naśvaratvaṃ mad-vigrahasya māyā-mayatvaṃ ca manyamānā māṃ prapadyante aham api tān punaḥ punar naśvara-janma-karmavato
GE07bhg4c04u:601: māyā-pāśa-patitān eva kurvāṇas tat-pratiphalaṃ janma-mṛtyu-duḥkham eva dadāmi |
GE07bhg4c04u:602: ye tu maj-janma-karmaṇor nityatvaṃ mad-vigrahasya ca
GE07bhg4c04u:604: prapadyante, teṣāṃ sva-deha-dvaya-bhaṅgam evecchatāṃ mumukṣūṇām anaśvaraṃ
GE07bhg4c04u:607: tasmān na kevalaṃ mad-bhaktā eva māṃ prapadyante, api tu sarvaśaḥ sarve 'pi manuṣyā jñāninaḥ karmiṇo yoginaś ca devatāntaropāsakāś
GE07bhg4c04u:608: ca mama vartmānuvartante mama sarva-svarūpatvāt jñāna-karmādikaṃ sarvaṃ māmakam eva vartmeti bhāvaḥ ||11||
GE07bhg4c04u:609: baladevaḥ : nanu nitya-janmādi-manojñaḥ sarveśvaras tvaṃ mayāvagata-kvacittvaṅguṣṭha-mātrādir apīśvaro janmādi-śūnyaḥ śrūyate |
GE07bhg4c04u:610: tat kiṃ tava tvad-upāsanasya ca vaividhyaṃ bhaved iti ced om ity āha ye
GE07bhg4c04u:612: ye bhaktā mām ekaṃ vaidūryam iva bahu-rūpaṃ sarveśvaraṃ yathā yena prakāreṇa bhāveneti yāvat prapadyante bhajanti, tān ahaṃ tādṛśas
GE07bhg4c04u:613: tathaiva tad-bhāvānusāriṇā rūpeṇa bhāvena ca bhajāmi sākṣāt bhavann
GE07bhg4c04u:621: kāṅkṣantaḥ karmaṇāṃ siddhiṃ yajanta iha devatāḥ |
GE07bhg4c04u:622: kṣipraṃ hi mānuṣe loke siddhir bhavati karmajā ||12||
GE07bhg4c04u:623: śrīdharaḥ : tarhi mokṣārtham eva kim iti sarve tvāṃ na bhajantīti |
GE07bhg4c04u:625: karmaṇāṃ siddhiṃ karma-phalaṃ kāṅkṣantaḥ prāyeneha mānuṣya-loke indrādi-devatā eva yajante
GE07bhg4c04u:627: hi yasmāt karmajā siddhiḥ karmajaṃ phalaṃ śīghraṃ bhavati |
GE07bhg4c04u:630: madhusūdanaḥ : nanu tvām eva bhagavantaṃ vāsudevaṃ kim iti sarve na
GE07bhg4c04u:633: kāṅkṣanta iha loke devatā devān indrāgny-ādyān yajante pūjayanti ajñāna-pratihatatvān na tu niṣkāmāḥ santo māṃ bhagavantaṃ vāsudevam iti śeṣaḥ |
GE07bhg4c04u:635: karmajā siddhiḥ karma-janyaṃ phalaṃ kṣipraṃ śīghram eva bhavati mānuṣe
GE07bhg4c04u:637: jñāna-phalaṃ tv antaḥkaraṇa-śuddhi-sāpekṣatvān na kṣipraṃ bhavati |
GE07bhg4c04u:638: mānuṣe loke karma-phalaṃ śīghraṃ bhavatīti viśeṣaṇād anya-loke 'pi
GE07bhg4c04u:640: yatas tat tat kṣudra-phala-siddhy-arthaṃ sa-kāmā mokṣa-vimukhā anyā devatā yajante 'to na mumukṣava iva māṃ vāsudevaṃ sākṣāt te prapadyanta ity
GE07bhg4c04u:642: viśvanāthaḥ : tatrāpi manuṣyeṣu madhye kāminas tu mama sākṣād-bhūtam api
GE07bhg4c04u:643: bhakti-mārgaṃ parihāya śīghra-phala-sādhakaṃ karma-vartmaivānuvartanta ity āha kāṅkṣanta iti
GE07bhg4c04u:645: baladevaḥ : evaṃ prāsaṅgikaṃ procya prakṛtasya niṣkāma-karmaṇo
GE07bhg4c04u:646: jñānākāratvaṃ vadiṣyaṃs tad anuṣṭhātuṃ viralatvam āha kāṅkṣanta iti |
GE07bhg4c04u:649: yajante sakāmaiḥ karmabhir na tu sarva-deveśvaraṃ nityānanda-phala-pradam
GE07bhg4c04u:651: hi yasmād asmin mānuṣe loke karmajā siddhiḥ kṣipraṃ bhavati |
GE07bhg4c04u:652: niṣkāma-karmārādhitān matto jñānato mokṣa-lakṣaṇā siddhis tu cireṇaiva bhavatīti |
GE07bhg4c04u:660: tasya kartāram api māṃ viddhy akartāram avyayam ||13||
GE07bhg4c04u:661: śrīdharaḥ : nanu kecit sakāmatayā pravartante, kecit niṣkāmatayā iti
GE07bhg4c04u:663: tat-kartṛṇā ca brāhmaṇādīnām uttama-madhyamādi-vaicitryaṃ kurvatas tava kathaṃ vaiṣamyaṃ nāsti ? ity āśaṅkyāha cāturvarṇyam iti |
GE07bhg4c04u:664: catvāro varṇā eveti cāturvarṇyaṃ svārthe ṣyañ-pratyayaḥ |
GE07bhg4c04u:665: ayam arthaḥ -- sattva-pradhānā brāhmaṇās teṣāṃ śama-damādīni karmāṇi |
GE07bhg4c04u:666: sattva- rajaḥ-pradhānāḥ kṣatriyās teṣāṃ śaurya-yuddhādīni karmāṇi |
GE07bhg4c04u:667: rajas- tamaḥ-pradhānā vaiśyās teṣāṃ kṛṣi-vāṇijyādīni karmāṇi |
GE07bhg4c04u:669: ity evaṃ guṇānāṃ karmaṇāṃ ca vibhāgaiś cāturvarṇyaṃ mayaiva sṛṣṭam iti satyam, tathāpy evaṃ tasya kartāram api phalato 'kartāram eva māṃ viddhi |
GE07bhg4c04u:672: madhusūdanaḥ : śarīrārambhaka-guṇa-vaiṣamyād api na sarve samāna-svabhāvā
GE07bhg4c04u:674: catvāro varṇā eva cāturvarṇyaṃ svārthe ṣyañ |
GE07bhg4c04u:677: tathā hi sattva-pradhānā brāhmaṇās teṣāṃ ca
GE07bhg4c04u:680: kṣatriyās teṣāṃ ca tādṛśāni śaurya-tejaḥ-prabhṛtīni karmāṇi |
GE07bhg4c04u:681: tama-upasarjana-rajaḥ-pradhānā vaiśyās teṣāṃ ca kṛṣy-ādīni tādṛśāni karmāṇi |
GE07bhg4c04u:682: tamaḥ-pradhānāḥ śūdrās teṣāṃ ca tāmasāni traivarṇika-śuśrūṣādīni
GE07bhg4c04u:684: evaṃ tarhi viṣama-svabhāva-cāturvarṇya-sraṣṭṛtena tava vaiṣamyaṃ durvāram
GE07bhg4c04u:685: ity āśaṅkya nety āha tasya viṣama-svabhāvasya cāturvarṇyasya
GE07bhg4c04u:686: vyavahāra-dṛṣṭyā kartāram api māṃ paramārtha-dṛṣṭyā viddhy akartāram avyayaṃ nirahaṅkāratvenākṣīṇa-mahimānam
GE07bhg4c04u:687: viśvanāthaḥ : nanu bhakti-jñāna-mārgau mocakau, karma-mārgas tu bandhaka iti sarva-mārga-sraṣṭari tvayi parameśvare vaiṣamyaṃ prasaktam |
GE07bhg4c04u:688: tatra nahi nahīty āha cāturvarṇyam iti |
GE07bhg4c04u:691: atra sattva-pradhānā brāhmaṇās teṣāṃ śama-damādīni karmāṇi
GE07bhg4c04u:694: tamaḥ-pradhānāḥ śūdrās teṣāṃ paricaryātmakaṃ karmety evaṃ guṇa-karma-vibhāgaśo guṇānāṃ karmaṇāṃ ca vibhāgaiś catvāro varṇā mayā
GE07bhg4c04u:696: kintu teṣāṃ kartāraṃ sraṣṭāram api mām akartāram asraṣṭāram eva viddhi |
GE07bhg4c04u:698: sraṣṭāram api māṃ vastutas tv asraṣṭāram |
GE07bhg4c04u:702: sraṣṭṛtve 'pi na sāmyaṃ kiṃcid evety arthaḥ ||13||
GE07bhg4c04u:710_0: tamaḥ-pradhānāḥ śūdrās teṣāṃ viprādi-trika-paricaryādīnīti guṇa-vibhāgaiḥ karma-vibhāgaiś ca vibhaktāś catvāro varṇāḥ sarveśvareṇa
GE07bhg4c04u:710_1: mayā sṛṣṭāḥ sthiti-saṃhṛtyor upalakṣaṇam etat brahmādi-stambāntasya prapañcasyāham eva sargādi-karteti |
GE07bhg4c04u:711: yad āha sūtrakāraḥ - janmādy asya yataḥ [Vs 1.1.2] iti |
GE07bhg4c04u:712: tasya sargādeḥ kartāram api māṃ tat tat karmāntaritatvād akartāraṃ viddhīti svasmin vaiṣamyādikaṃ parihṛtam |
GE07bhg4c04u:713: etat prāhāvyayaym iti sraṣṭṛtve 'pi sāmyān na vyemīty arthaḥ
GE07bhg4c04u:715: na māṃ karmāṇi limpanti na me karma-phale spṛhā |
GE07bhg4c04u:716: iti māṃ yo 'bhijānāti karmabhir na sa badhyate ||14||
GE07bhg4c04u:717: śrīdharaḥ : tad eva darśayann āha na mām iti |
GE07bhg4c04u:719: api māṃ na limpanty āsaktaṃ na kurvanti |
GE07bhg4c04u:723: karma-lepa-rahitatvena māṃ yo 'bhijānāti so 'pi karmabhir na badhyate |
GE07bhg4c04u:724: mama nirlepatve kāraṇaṃ nirahaṅkāratva-niḥspṛhatvādikaṃ jānatas tasyāpy ahaṅkārādi-śaithilyāt
GE07bhg4c04u:725: madhusūdanaḥ : karmāṇi viśva-sargādīni māṃ nirahaṅkāratvena kartṛtvena
GE07bhg4c04u:726: kartṛtvābhimāna-hīnaṃ bhagavantaṃ na limpanti dehārambhakatvena na badhnanti |
GE07bhg4c04u:727: evaṃ kartṛtvaṃ nirākṛtya bhoktṛtvaṃ nirākaroti na me
GE07bhg4c04u:728: mamāpta-kāmasya karma-phale spṛhā tṛṣṇā āpta-kāmasya kā spṛhā iti śruteḥ |
GE07bhg4c04u:729: kartṛtvābhimāna-phala-spṛhābhyāṃ hi karmāṇi limpanti tad-abhāvān na māṃ karmāṇi limpantīti
GE07bhg4c04u:731: cātmatvenābhijānāti karmabhir na sa badhyate 'kartrātma-jñānena mucyata ity arthaḥ ||14||
GE07bhg4c04u:732: viśvanāthaḥ : nanv etat tāvad āstām, samprati tvaṃ kṣatriya-kule 'vatīrṇaḥ
GE07bhg4c04u:734: tatra kā vārtā ity ata āha na mām iti |
GE07bhg4c04u:735: na limpanti jīvam iva na liptīkurvanti |
GE07bhg4c04u:738: 'pi loka-pravartanārtham eva me karmādi-karaṇam iti bhāvaḥ |
GE07bhg4c04u:740: yas tu na jānāti sa karmabhir badhyata iti bhāvaḥ ||14||
GE07bhg4c04u:741: baladevaḥ : etad viśadayati na mām iti |
GE07bhg4c04u:742: karmāṇi viśva-sargādīni māṃ na limpanti vaiṣamyādi-doṣeṇa jīvam iva liptaṃ na kurvanti, yat tāni sṛjya-jīva-karma-prayuktāni na ca mat-prayuktāni na ca sargādi-karma-phale
GE07bhg4c04u:752: pradhāna-kāraṇībhūtā yato vai sṛjya-śaktayaḥ || ity ādyā |
GE07bhg4c04u:753: sṛjyānāṃ deva-mānavādi-bhāva-bhājāṃ kṣetrajñānāṃ sarga-kriyāyām asau pareśo nimitta-mātram eva devādi-bhāva-vaicitryāṃ kāraṇībhūtās tu sṛjyānāṃ
GE07bhg4c04u:757: evaṃ jñānasya phalam āha iti mām iti |
GE07bhg4c04u:762: evaṃ jñātvā kṛtaṃ karma pūrvair api mumukṣubhiḥ |
GE07bhg4c04u:763: kuru karmaiva tasmāt tvaṃ pūrvaiḥ pūrvataraṃ kṛtam ||15||
GE07bhg4c04u:764: śrīdharaḥ : ye yathā mām ity ādi caturbhiḥ ślokaiḥ prāsaṅgikam īśvarasya
GE07bhg4c04u:765: vaiṣamyaṃ parihṛtya pūrvoktam eva karma-yogaṃ prapañcayitum anusmārayati evam iti |
GE07bhg4c04u:766: ahaṅkārādi-rāhityena kṛtaṃ karma bandhakaṃ na bhavati |
GE07bhg4c04u:767: ity evaṃ jñātvā pūrvair janakādibhir api mumukṣubhiḥ sattva-śuddhy-arthaṃ
GE07bhg4c04u:769: tasmāt tvam api prathamaṃ karmaiva kuru
GE07bhg4c04u:770: madhusūdanaḥ : yato nāhaṃ kartā na me karma-phala-spṛheti jñānāt karmabhir na badhyate 'ta āha evam iti |
GE07bhg4c04u:772: karma pūrvair atikrāntair api asmin yuge yayāti-yadu-prabhṛtibhir
GE07bhg4c04u:774: tasmāt tvam api karmaiva kuru na tūṣṇīm āsanaṃ nāpi saṃnyāsam |
GE07bhg4c04u:777: pūrvair janakādibhiḥ pūrvataram atipūrvaṃ yugāntare kṛtam |
GE07bhg4c04u:778: etenāsmin yuge 'nya-yuge ca pūrva-pūrvataraiḥ kṛtatvād avaśyaṃ tvayā kartavyaṃ karmeti darśayati ||15||
GE07bhg4c04u:779: viśvanāthaḥ : evambhūtam eva māṃ jñātvā pūrvair janakādibhir api
GE07bhg4c04u:782: mām eva jñātvā tad-anusāribhir mac-chiṣyaiḥ pūrvair
GE07bhg4c04u:784: tasmāt tvam api karmaiva tat kuru |
GE07bhg4c04u:787: jñāna-garbhāyai citta-śuddhyai śuddha-cittaś cel loka-saṅgrahāyety arthaḥ
GE07bhg4c04u:788: | kīdṛśaṃ pūrvais taiḥ kṛtaṃ ? pūrvataraṃ atiprācīnam ||15||
GE07bhg4c04u:790: kiṃ karma kim akarmeti kavayo 'py atra mohitāḥ |
GE07bhg4c04u:791: tat te karma pravakṣyāmi yaj jñātvā mokṣyase 'śubhāt ||16||
GE07bhg4c04u:792: śrīdharaḥ : tac ca tattvavidbhiḥ saha vicārya kartavyam |
GE07bhg4c04u:799: ato yaj jñātā yad-anuṣṭhāyāśubhāt saṃsārān mokṣyase mukto bhaviṣyasi tat karmākarma ca tubhyam ahaṃ pravakṣyāmi tac chṛṇu
GE07bhg4c04u:800: madhusūdanaḥ : nanu karma-viṣaye kiṃ kaścit saṃśayo 'py asti yena pūrvaiḥ
GE07bhg4c04u:801: pūrvataraṃ kṛtam ity atinirbadhnāsi ? asty evety āha kiṃ karmeti |
GE07bhg4c04u:802: nau-sthasya niṣkriyeṣv api taṭastha-vṛkṣeṣu gamana-bhrama-darśanāt tathā dūrāc cakṣuḥ-saṃnikṛṣṭeṣu gacchatsv api puruṣeṣv agamana-bhrama-darśanāt
GE07bhg4c04u:803: paramārthataḥ kiṃ karma kiṃ vā paramārthato 'karmeti kavayo medhāvino 'py
GE07bhg4c04u:804: atrāsmin viṣaye mohitā mohaṃ nirṇayāsāmarthyaṃ prāptā
GE07bhg4c04u:806: tat tasmāt te tubhyam ahaṃ karma,
GE07bhg4c04u:807: a-kāra-praśleṣeṇa cchedād akarma ca pravakṣyāmi prakarṣeṇa sandehocchedena
GE07bhg4c04u:809: yat karmākarma-svarūpaṃ jñātvā mokṣyase mukto bhaviṣyasy aśubhāt saṃsārāt ||16||
GE07bhg4c04u:810: viśvanāthaḥ : kiṃ ca karmāpi na gatānugatika-nyāyenaiva kevalaṃ vivekinā kartavyam |
GE07bhg4c04u:811: kintu tasya prakāra-viśeṣaṃ jñātvaivety atas tasya prathamaṃ durjñeyatvam āha ||16||
GE07bhg4c04u:812: baladevaḥ : nanu kiṃ karma-viṣayakaḥ kaścit sandeho 'py asti yataḥ pūrvaiḥ
GE07bhg4c04u:813: pūrvataraṃ kṛtam ity atinirbandhād bravīṣīti ced asty evety āha kiṃ karmeti |
GE07bhg4c04u:814: mumukṣubhir anuṣṭheyaṃ karma kiṃ rūpaṃ syād akarma ca karmānyat
GE07bhg4c04u:815: tad-antargataṃ jñānaṃ ca kiṃ rūpam ity arthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c04u:817: atrārthe kavayo dhīmanto 'pi mohitās tad-yāthātmya-nirṇayāsāmarthyān mohaṃ prāpuḥ |
GE07bhg4c04u:818: ahaṃ sarveśaḥ sarvajñas te tubhyaṃ tat karma a-kāra-praśleṣād
GE07bhg4c04u:819: akarma ca pravakṣyāmi yaj jñātvānuṣṭhāya prāpya cāśubhāt saṃsārān mokṣyase
GE07bhg4c04u:821: karmaṇo hy api boddhavyaṃ boddhavyaṃ ca vikarmaṇaḥ |
GE07bhg4c04u:822: akarmaṇaś ca boddhavyaṃ gahanā karmaṇo gatiḥ ||17||
GE07bhg4c04u:823: śrīdharaḥ : nanu loka-prasiddham eva karma dehādi-vyāpārātmakam |
GE07bhg4c04u:826: ataḥ katham ucyate kavayo 'py atra mohaṃ prāptā iti ?
GE07bhg4c04u:835: madhusūdanaḥ : nanu sarva-loka-prasiddhatvād aham evaitaj jānāmi
GE07bhg4c04u:836: dehendriyādi-vyāpāraḥ karma tūṣṇīm āsanam akarmeti tatra kiṃ tvayā vaktavyam iti tatrāha karmaṇa iti |
GE07bhg4c04u:838: tattvaṃ boddhavyam asti, vikarmaṇaś ca pratiṣiddhasya, akarmaṇaś ca tūṣṇīmbhāvasya |
GE07bhg4c04u:844: tathākarmaṇaḥ karmākaraṇasyāpi sannyāsinaḥ kīdṛśaṃ karmākaraṇaṃ śubhadam iti |
GE07bhg4c04u:845: anyathā niḥśreyasaṃ kathaṃ hasta-gataṃ syād iti bhāvaḥ |
GE07bhg4c04u:850: baladevaḥ : nanu kavayo 'pi mohaṃ prāpur iti cet tatrāha karmaṇo hīti |
GE07bhg4c04u:851: karmaṇo niṣkāmasya mumukṣubhir anuṣṭhātavyasya svarūpaṃ boddhavyam |
GE07bhg4c04u:853: akarmaṇaś ca karma-bhinnasya jñānasya ca svarūpaṃ boddhavyam |
GE07bhg4c04u:858: karmaṇy akarma yaḥ paśyed akarmaṇi ca karma yaḥ |
GE07bhg4c04u:859: sa buddhimān manuṣyeṣu sa yuktaḥ kṛtsna-karma-kṛt ||18||
GE07bhg4c04u:860: śrīdharaḥ : tad evaṃ karmādīnāṃ durvijñeyatvaṃ darśayann āha karmaṇīti |
GE07bhg4c04u:861: parameśvarārādhana-lakṣaṇe karmaṇi karma-viṣaye akarma karmedaṃ na
GE07bhg4c04u:864: akarmaṇi ca vihitākaraṇe karma yaḥ paśyet pratyavāyotpādakatvena bandha-hetutvāt |
GE07bhg4c04u:865: manuṣyeṣu karma kurvāṇeṣu sa buddhimān vyavasāyātmaka-buddhimattvāc
GE07bhg4c04u:870: sarvataḥ samplutodaka-sthānīye ca tasmin karmaṇi sarva-karma-phalānām antarbhāvāt tad evam
GE07bhg4c04u:871: karma-yogādhikārāvasthāyāṃ na karmaṇām anārambhād ity ādinokta eva
GE07bhg4c04u:875: anenaiva yogārūḍhāvasthāyāṃ yas tv ātma-ratir eva syād ity ādinā yaḥ karmānupayoga uktas tasyāpy arthāt prapañcaḥ kṛto veditavyaḥ
GE07bhg4c04u:876: | yad ārurukṣor api karma bandhakaṃ na bhavati tad-ārūḍhasya kuto bandhakaṃ syāt ity atrāpi śloko yujyate |
GE07bhg4c04u:877: yad vā, karmaṇi dehendriyādi-vyāpāre vartamāne 'py ātmano
GE07bhg4c04u:878: dehādi-vyatirekānubhavena akarma svābhāvikaṃ niaṣkarmyam eva yaḥ paśyet
GE07bhg4c04u:879: tathā akarmaṇi ca jñāna-rahite duḥkha-buddhyā karmaṇāṃ tyāge karma yaḥ paśyet tasya prayatna-sādhyatvena mithyācāratvāt |
GE07bhg4c04u:881: ya evambhūtaḥ sa tu sarveṣu manuṣyeṣu buddhimān paṇḍitaḥ |
GE07bhg4c04u:882: tatra hetuḥ - yataḥ kṛtsnāni sarvāṇi yadṛcchayā prāptāny āhārādīni karmāṇi kurvann api sa yukta eva akartrātma-jñānena samādhistha evety arthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c04u:885: ajñasya tu rāgataḥ kṛtaṃ doṣāya iti vikarmaṇo 'pi tattvaṃ nirūpitaṃ draṣṭavyam ||18||
GE07bhg4c04u:886: madhusūdanaḥ : kīdṛśaṃ tarhi karmādīnāṃ tattvam iti tad āha karmaṇīti |
GE07bhg4c04u:887: karmaṇi dehendriyādi-vyāpāre vihite pratiṣiddhe cāhaṃ karomīti
GE07bhg4c04u:890: samāropite calana ivākartātma-svarūpālocanena vastutaḥ karmābhāvaṃ taṭastha-vṛkṣādiṣv iva yaḥ paśyet paśyati |
GE07bhg4c04u:891: tathā dehendriyādiṣu triguṇa-māyā-pariṇāmatvena sarvadā savyāpāreṣu nirvyāpāras tūṣṇīṃ sukham āsa ity abhimānena samāropite 'karmaṇi vyāpāroparame
GE07bhg4c04u:892: dūrastha-cakṣuḥ-saṃnikṛṣṭa-puruṣeṣu gacchatsv apy agamana iva sarvadā sa-vyāpāra-dehendriyādi-svarūpa-paryālocanena vastu-gatyā karma
GE07bhg4c04u:893: nivṛttyākhya-prayatna-rūpaṃ vyāpāraṃ yaḥ paśyed udāhṛta-puruṣeṣu gamanam iva |
GE07bhg4c04u:894: audāsīnyāvasthāyām apy udāsīno 'ham āsa ity abhimāna eva karma |
GE07bhg4c04u:895: etādṛśaḥ paramārtha-darśī sa buddhimān ity ādinā
GE07bhg4c04u:901: tatra yat tvaṃ manyase karmaṇo bandha-hetutvāt tūṣṇīm eva mayā sukhena sthātavyam iti tan mṛṣā |
GE07bhg4c04u:902: asati kartṛtvābhimāne vihitasya pratiṣiddhasya vā karmaṇo bandha-hetutvābhāvāt |
GE07bhg4c04u:903: tathā ca vyākhyātaṃ na māṃ karmāṇi limpanti [Gītā 4.14] ity ādinā |
GE07bhg4c04u:904: satica kartṛtvābhimāne tūṣṇīm aham āsa ity audāsīnyābhimānātmakaṃ yat karma tad api bandha-hetur
GE07bhg4c04u:906: tasmāt karma-vikarmākarmaṇāṃ tattvam īdṛśaṃ jñātvā vikarmākarmaṇī parityajya kartṛtvābhimāna-phalābhisandhi-hānena
GE07bhg4c04u:908: aparā vyākhyā karmaṇi jñāna-karmaṇi dṛśye jaḍe sad-rūpeṇa sphuraṇa-rūpeṇa
GE07bhg4c04u:912: kalpitaṃ karma dṛśyaṃ māyā-mayaṃ na paramārtha-sat |
GE07bhg4c04u:915: yas tu sarvāṇi bhūtāni ātmany evānupaśyati |
GE07bhg4c04u:916: sarva-bhūteṣu cātmānaṃ tato na vijugupsate || [ĪśaU 6] iti śruteḥ |
GE07bhg4c04u:917: evaṃ parasparādhyāse 'pi śuddhaṃ vastu yaḥ paśyati manuṣyeṣu madhye sa eva buddhimān nānyaḥ
GE07bhg4c04u:922: ataḥ sa evāntaḥkaraṇa-śuddhi-sādhana-kṛtsna-karma-kṛd iti vāstava-dharmair eva stūyate
GE07bhg4c04u:923: yasmād evaṃ tasmāt tvam api paramārtha-darśī bhava tāvataiva kṛtsna-karma-kāritvopapatter ity abhiprāyaḥ |
GE07bhg4c04u:924: ato yad uktaṃ yaj jñātvā mokṣyase 'śubhād iti |
GE07bhg4c04u:925: yac coktaṃ karmādīnāṃ tattvaṃ boddhavyam astīti sa buddhimān ity ādi-stutiś ca |
GE07bhg4c04u:928: atattvaṃ cānyan na boddhavyaṃ na vā yaj-jñāne
GE07bhg4c04u:930: yat tu vyākhyānaṃ karmaṇi nitye parameśvarārthe 'nuṣṭhīyamāne
GE07bhg4c04u:932: tathākarmaṇi ca nitya-karmākaraṇe pratyavāya-hetutvena karmedam iti yaḥ paśyet sa buddhimān ity ādi tad asaṅgatam eva |
GE07bhg4c04u:933: nitya-karmaṇy akarmedam iti jñānasyāśubha-mokṣa-hetutvābhāvāt, mithyājñānatvena tasyivāśubhatvāc ca |
GE07bhg4c04u:934: na caitādṛśaṃ mithyā-jñānaṃ boddhavyaṃ tattvaṃ nāpy etādṛśa-jñāne
GE07bhg4c04u:936: nitya-karmānuṣṭhānaṃ hi svarūpato 'ntaḥkaraṇa-śuddhi-dvāropayujyate na tatrākarma-buddhiḥ kutrāpy upayujyate śāstreṇa nāmādiṣu brahma-dṛṣṭivad avihitatvāt |
GE07bhg4c04u:946: hy artho vidhīyata iti nyāyena bhāvārthasyaivāpūrva-janakatvāt |
GE07bhg4c04u:947: atirātre ṣoḍaśinaṃ na gṛhṇāti ity ādāv api
GE07bhg4c04u:951: tad-viruddhatayā yad-upaveśanādi karma tad eva nitya-karmākaraṇopalakṣitaṃ
GE07bhg4c04u:953: ataevākurvan vihitaṃ karmety atra lakṣaṇārthe śatā vyākhyātaḥ |
GE07bhg4c04u:954: lakṣaṇa-hetvoḥ kriyāyā ity aviśeṣa-smaraṇe 'py atra hetutvānupapatteḥ |
GE07bhg4c04u:958: nityānuṣṭhāna-param evaitad vākyaṃ nityāni kuryād ity arthe karmaṇy akarma yaḥ paśyed ity ādi tad-abodhakaraṃ vākyaṃ prayuñjānasya bhagavataḥ
GE07bhg4c04u:959: pratārakatvāpatter ity ādi bhāṣya eva vistareṇa vyākhyātam ity uparamyate
GE07bhg4c04u:960: viśvanāthaḥ : tatra karmākarmaṇos tattva-bodham āha karmaṇīti |
GE07bhg4c04u:961: śuddhāntaḥ-karaṇasya jñānavattve 'pi janakāder ivākṛta-sannyāsasya karmaṇy anuṣṭhīyamāne niṣkāma-karma-yoge akarma |
GE07bhg4c04u:962: karmedaṃ na bhavatīti yaḥ paśyet tat-karmaṇo bandhakatvābhāvāt iti bhāvaḥ |
GE07bhg4c04u:964: karmākaraṇe karma paśyet durgati-prāpakaṃ karma-bandham evopalabhate |
GE07bhg4c04u:966: sa tu kṛtsna-karmāṇy eva karoti, na tu tasya
GE07bhg4c04u:967: jñāna-vāvadūkasya jñāni-māninaḥ saṅgenāpi tad-vacasāpi sannyāsaṃ na karotīti bhāvaḥ |
GE07bhg4c04u:971: surān ātmānam ātma-sthaṃ nihnute māṃ ca dharma-hā |
GE07bhg4c04u:973: baladevaḥ : karmākarmaṇor boddhavyaṃ svarūpam āha karmaṇīti |
GE07bhg4c04u:974: anuṣṭhīyamāne niṣkāme karmaṇi yo 'karma prastutatvāt karmaṇy ātma-jñānaṃ
GE07bhg4c04u:975: paśyet, akarmaṇy ātma-jñāne yaḥ karma paśyet |
GE07bhg4c04u:976: etad uktaṃ bhavati - yo mumukṣur hṛd-viśuddhaye kriyamāṇaṃ karmātma-jñānānusandhi-garbhatvāj
GE07bhg4c04u:977: jñānākāraṃ, tac ca jñānaṃ karma-dvārakatvāt karmākāraṃ paśyet |
GE07bhg4c04u:978: ubhayor ekātmoddeśyatvād ubhayam ekaṃ vidyād ity arthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c04u:982: ātma-yāthātmyaṃ yo 'nusandhatte sa manuṣyeṣu buddhimān paṇḍitaḥ |
GE07bhg4c04u:990: śrīdharaḥ : karmaṇy akarma yaḥ paśyed ity anena śruty-arthārthāpattibhyāṃ
GE07bhg4c04u:991: yad uktam artha-dvandvaṃ tad eva spaṣṭayati yasyeti pañcabhiḥ |
GE07bhg4c04u:994: tat-saṅkalpena varjitā yasya bhavanti taṃ paṇḍitam āhuḥ |
GE07bhg4c04u:995: tatra hetur yatas taiḥ samārambhaiḥ śuddhe citte sati jātena jñānāgninā dagdhāny akarmatāṃ nītāni karmāṇi yasya tam |
GE07bhg4c04u:1002: madhusūdanaḥ : tad etat paramārtha-darśinaḥ kartṛtvābhimānābhāvena karmāliptatvaṃ prapañcyate yasya sarva ity ādi brahma-karma-samādhinety
GE07bhg4c04u:1004: yasya pūrvokta-paramārtha-darśinaḥ sarve yāvanto vaidikā laukikā vā samārambhāḥ samārabhyanta iti vyutpattyā karmāṇi kāma-saṅkalpa-varjitāḥ
GE07bhg4c04u:1005: kāmaḥ phala-tṛṣṇā saṅkalpo 'haṃ karomīti kartṛtvābhimānas tābhyāṃ varjitāḥ
GE07bhg4c04u:1008: taṃ karmādāv akarmādi-darśanaṃ jñānaṃ tad evāgnis tena dagdhāni śubhāśubha-lakṣaṇāni karmāṇi yasya tad-adhigama
GE07bhg4c04u:1010: jñānāgni-dagdha-karmāṇaṃ taṃ budhā brahma-vidaḥ paramārthataḥ paṇḍitam āhuḥ |
GE07bhg4c04u:1011: samyag-darśī hi paṇḍita ucyate na tu bhrānta ity arthaḥ ||19||
GE07bhg4c04u:1012: viśvanāthaḥ : uktam arthaṃ vivṛṇoti yasyeti pañcabhiḥ |
GE07bhg4c04u:1015: jñānam evāgnis tena dagdhāni karmāṇi kriyamāṇāni vihitāni niṣiddhāni ca yasya saḥ |
GE07bhg4c04u:1016: etena vikarmaṇaś ca boddhavyam ity api vivṛtam |
GE07bhg4c04u:1017: etādṛśādhikāriṇi karma yathā akarma paśyet, tathaiva vikarmāpy akarmaiva paśyed iti pūrva-ślokasyaiva saṅgatiḥ |
GE07bhg4c04u:1019: api ced asi pāpebhyaḥ sarvebhyaḥ pāpa-kṛttamaḥ |
GE07bhg4c04u:1022: jñānāgniḥ sarva-karmāṇi bhasmasāt kurute tathā || [Gītā 4.36-37] iti
GE07bhg4c04u:1023: baladevaḥ : karmaṇo jñānākāram āha yasyeti pañcabhiḥ |
GE07bhg4c04u:1024: samārambhāḥ karmāṇi kāmyanta iti kāmāḥ phalāni tat-saṅkalpena varjitāḥ śūnyā yasya karmabhir ātmoddeśino bhavanti |
GE07bhg4c04u:1032: karmaṇy abhipravṛtto 'pi naiva kiṃcit karoti saḥ ||20||
GE07bhg4c04u:1037: evambhūto yaḥ svābhāvike vihite vā karmaṇy abhitaḥ pravṛtto 'pi kiṃcid eva naiva
GE07bhg4c04u:1040: madhusūdanaḥ : bhavatu jñānāgninā prāktanānām aprārabdha-karmaṇāṃ dāha āgāmināṃ cānutpattiḥ
GE07bhg4c04u:1042: anantar-bhāvāt phalāya bhaved iti bhavet kasyacid āśaṅkā tām apanudaty āha
GE07bhg4c04u:1044: karmaṇi phale cāsaṅgaṃ kartṛtvābhimānaṃ bhogābhilāṣaṃ ca
GE07bhg4c04u:1047: nirāśraya āśrayo dehendriyādir advaita-darśanena nirgato yasmāt sa nirāśrayo
GE07bhg4c04u:1049: phala-kāmanāyāḥ kartṛtvābhimānasya ca nivṛttau hetu-garbhaṃ krameṇa viśeṣaṇa-dvayam |
GE07bhg4c04u:1050: evambhūto jīvanmukto vyutthāna-daśāyāṃ karmaṇi vaidike laukike vābhipravṛtto 'pi
GE07bhg4c04u:1052: sva-dṛṣṭyā naiva kiṃcit karoti sa niṣkriyātma-darśanena bādhitatvād ity arthaḥ ||20||
GE07bhg4c04u:1057: karma-phale saṅgaṃ tyaktvā nityenātmanānubhūtena tṛpto nirāśrayo yoga-kṣemaārtahm apy āśraya-rahita
GE07bhg4c04u:1058: īdṛśo yo 'dhikārī sa karmaṇy abhitaḥ pravṛtto 'pi naiva kiṃcit karoti |
GE07bhg4c04u:1059: karmānuṣṭhānāpadeśena jñāna-niṣṭhām eva sampādayatīty ārurukṣor daśeyam |
GE07bhg4c04u:1060: etena vikarmaṇaḥ svarūpaṃ bandhakatvaṃ boddhavyam ity uktaṃ bhavati ||20||
GE07bhg4c04u:1063: śārīraṃ kevalaṃ karma kurvan nāpnoti kilbiṣam ||21||
GE07bhg4c04u:1066: yataṃ niyataṃ cittam ātmā śarīraṃ ca yasya |
GE07bhg4c04u:1068: sa śarīraṃ śarīra-mātra-nirvartyaṃ kartṛtvābhiniveśa-rahitaṃ kurvann api kilbiṣam bandhanaṃ na prāpnoti |
GE07bhg4c04u:1070: śārīra-nirvāha-mātropayogi svābhāvikaṃ bhikṣāṭanādi kurvann api kilbiṣaṃ vihitākaraṇa-nimitta-doṣaṃ na prāpnoti ||21||
GE07bhg4c04u:1071: madhusūdanaḥ : yadātyanta-vikṣepa-hetor api jyotiṣṭomādeḥ samyag-jñāna-vaśān na tat-phala-janakatvaṃ tadā śarīra-sthiti-mātra-hetor
GE07bhg4c04u:1072: avikṣepakasya bhikṣāṭanāder nāsty eva bandha-hetutvam iti
GE07bhg4c04u:1074: nirāśīr gata-tṛṣṇo yata-cittātmā cittam antaḥkaraṇam ātmā bāhyendriya-sahito dehas tau saṃyatau pratyāhāreṇa nigṛhītau yena saḥ |
GE07bhg4c04u:1076: tyakta-sarva-parigrahas tyaktāḥ sarve parigrahā bhogopakaraṇāni yena saḥ |
GE07bhg4c04u:1078: kaupīnācchādanādi-grahaṇa-bhikṣāṭanādi-rūpaṃ yatiṃ prati śāstrābhyanujñātaṃ karma kāyikaṃ vācikaṃ mānasaṃ ca, tad api kevalaṃ
GE07bhg4c04u:1079: kartṛtvābhimāna-śūnyaṃ parādhyāropita-kartṛtvena kurvan paramārthato 'kartrātma-darśanān nāpnoti na prāpnoti kilbiṣaṃ dharmādharma-phala-bhūtam
GE07bhg4c04u:1080: aniṣṭaṃ saṃsāraṃ pāpavat puṇyasyāpy aniṣṭa-phalatvena kilbiṣatvam |
GE07bhg4c04u:1081: ye tu śarīra-nirvartyaṃ śārīram iti vyācakṣate tan mate kevalaṃ karma kurvann ity ato 'dhikārthālābhād avyāvartakatvena śārīra-padasya
GE07bhg4c04u:1084: karma-padasya vihita-mātra-paratvena śārīraṃ vihitaṃ karma kurvan nāpnoti kilbiṣam ity aprasakta-pratiṣedho 'narthakaḥ |
GE07bhg4c04u:1085: pratiṣiddha-sādhāraṇa-paratve 'py evam eva vyāghāta iti bhāṣya eva
GE07bhg4c04u:1089: karmāsat-pratigrahādikaṃ kurvann api kilbiṣaṃ pāpaṃ nāpnotīty etad api vikarmaṇaś ca boddhavyam ity asya vivaraṇam ||21||
GE07bhg4c04u:1090: baladevaḥ : athārūḍhasya daśām āha nirāśīr iti tribhiḥ |
GE07bhg4c04u:1099: samaḥ siddhāv asiddhau ca kṛtvāpi na nibadhyate ||22||
GE07bhg4c04u:1109: pūrvottara-bhūmikayor yathāyathaṃ vihitaṃ svābhāvikaṃ vā karma kṛtvāpi
GE07bhg4c04u:1113: tatrānnācchādanādi-vyatirekeṇa śarīra-sthiter asaṃbhavād yācñādināpi sva-prayatnenānnādikaṃ sampādyam iti prāpte niyamāyāha yadṛcchā-lābheti |
GE07bhg4c04u:1115: 'nnācchādanādeḥ śāstrānumatasya sa yadṛcchālābhas tena santuṣṭas tad-adhika-tṛṣṇā-rahitaḥ
GE07bhg4c04u:1116: tathā ca śāstraṃ bhaikṣaṃ caret iti prakṛṣya ayācitam asaṃk ptam upapannaṃ yadṛcchayā iti
GE07bhg4c04u:1121: yatayo bhikṣārthaṃ grāmaṃ viśantīty ādi-śāstrānumatas tu prayatnaḥ kartavya eva |
GE07bhg4c04u:1124: pāduke cāpi gṛhṇīyāt kuryān nānyasya saṅgraham || ity ādi |
GE07bhg4c04u:1125: evam anyad api vidhi-niṣedha-rūpaṃ śāstram ūhyam |
GE07bhg4c04u:1126: nanu sva-prayatnam antareṇālābhe śītoṣṇādi-pīḍitaḥ kathaṃ jīved ata āha dvandvātīta dvandvāni kṣut-pipāsā-śītoṣṇa-varṣādīni atīto 'tikrāntaḥ
GE07bhg4c04u:1131: ataeva parasya lābhe svasyālābhe ca vimatsaraḥ parotkarṣāsahana-pūrvikā svotkarṣa-vāñchā matsaras
GE07bhg4c04u:1134: yadṛcchā-lābhasya siddhāv asiddhau ca siddhau na hṛṣṭo nāpy asiddhau viṣaṇṇaḥ sa svānubhavenākartaiva parair āropita-kartṛtvaḥ
GE07bhg4c04u:1136: nibadhyate bandha-hetoḥ sa-hetukasya karmaṇo jñānāgninā dagdhatvād iti pūrvoktānuvādaḥ ||22||
GE07bhg4c04u:1138: baladevaḥ : atha śarīra-nirvāhārtham annācchādanādikaṃ sva-prayatnena na sampādyam ity āha yadṛcchayeti |
GE07bhg4c04u:1139: yācñāṃ vinaiva lābho yadṛcchā-lābhas tena santuṣṭas tṛptaḥ |
GE07bhg4c04u:1142: 'nyair upadruto 'pi taiḥ saha vairam akurvan yadṛcchā-lābha-siddhau
GE07bhg4c04u:1143: harṣasya tad-asiddhau viṣādasya cābhāvāt sama evaṃbhūtaḥ śārīraṃ karma
GE07bhg4c04u:1144: kṛtvāpi tena tena na badhyate jñāna-niṣṭhā-prabhāvān na lipyate ||22||
GE07bhg4c04u:1151: yajñāya parameśvarārthaṃ karmācarataḥ sataḥ samagraṃ savāsanaṃ karma pravilīyate |
GE07bhg4c04u:1156: loka-saṃgrahārtham eva karma kurvata ity arthaḥ ||23||
GE07bhg4c04u:1158_0: yac-charīra-sthiti-mātra-prayojanaṃ bhikṣāṭanādi-rūpaṃ karma tat kṛtvā na nibadhyata ity ukte gṛhasthasya brahma-vido janakāder
GE07bhg4c04u:1158_1: yajñādi-rūpaṃ yat karma tad-bandha-hetuḥ syād iti bhavet kasyacid āśaṅkā tām apanetuṃ tyaktvā karma-phalāsaṅgam ity ādinoktaṃ
GE07bhg4c04u:1160: nirvikalpaka-brahmātmaikya-bodha eva sthitaṃ cittaṃ yasya tasya sthita-prajñasyety arthaḥ
GE07bhg4c04u:1163: gata-saṅgatvaṃ kuto yato 'dhyāsa-hīnatvaṃ tat kuto yataḥ sthita-prajñatvam iti |
GE07bhg4c04u:1166: śreṣṭhācāratvena loka-pravṛtty-arthaṃ yajñāya viṣṇave tat-prīty-artham iti vā |
GE07bhg4c04u:1167: ācarataḥ karma yajña-dānādikaṃ samagraṃ sahāgreṇa phalena vidyata iti samagraṃ pravilīyate prakarṣeṇa kāraṇocchedena tattva-darśanād vilīyate vinaśyatīty arthaḥ ||23||
GE07bhg4c04u:1168: viśvanāthaḥ : yajño vakṣyamāṇa-lakṣaṇas tad-arthaṃ karmācaratas tat karma
GE07bhg4c04u:1172: tac-cintanam ācarataḥ prācīnaṃ bandhakaṃ karma samagraṃ kṛtsnaṃ
GE07bhg4c04u:1175: brahmārpaṇaṃ brahma havir brahmāgnau brahmaṇā hutam |
GE07bhg4c04u:1177: śrīdharaḥ : tad evaṃ parameśvarārādhana-lakṣaṇaṃ karma jñāna-hetutvena
GE07bhg4c04u:1180: bādhitatvāt svābhāvikam api karma-karmaiveti karmaṇy akarma yaḥ paśyed ity anenoktaḥ karma-pravilayaḥ prapañcitaḥ |
GE07bhg4c04u:1181: idānīṃ karmaṇi tad-aṅgeṣu ca brahmaivānusyūtaṃ paśyataḥ karma-pravilayam āha brahmārpaṇam iti |
GE07bhg4c04u:1188: agniś ca kartā ca kriyā ca brahmaivety arthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c04u:1189: evaṃ brahmaṇy eva karmātmake samādhiś cittaikāgryaṃ yasya tena brahmaiva gantavyaṃ prāpyam
GE07bhg4c04u:1191: madhusūdanaḥ : nanu kriyamāṇaṃ karma phalam ajanayitvaiva kuto naśyati
GE07bhg4c04u:1192: brahma-bodhe tat-kāraṇocchedād ity āha brahmārpaṇam iti |
GE07bhg4c04u:1195: sa eva tyajyamāna-dravyasyāgnau prakṣepād dhoma ity
GE07bhg4c04u:1197: tatroddeśyā devatā sampradānaṃ, tyajyamānaṃ dravyaṃ haviḥ-śabda-vācyaṃ sākṣād-dhātv-artha-karma, tat phalaṃ tu svargādi vyavahitaṃ bhāvanā-karma |
GE07bhg4c04u:1198: evaṃ dhārakatvena haviṣo 'gnau prakṣepe sādhakatamatayā juhvādi karaṇaṃ prakāśakatayā mantrādīti karaṇam api kāraka-jñāpaka-bhedena dvividham |
GE07bhg4c04u:1199: evaṃ tyāgo 'gnau prakṣepaś ca dve kriye
GE07bhg4c04u:1203: evaṃ deśa-kālādikam apy adhikaraṇaṃ sarva-kriyā-sādhāraṇaṃ draṣṭavyam |
GE07bhg4c04u:1207: dṛśyamāno 'pi dagdha-paṭa-nyāyena na phalāya kalpata ity anena ślokena
GE07bhg4c04u:1210: tathā hi - arpyate 'neneti karaṇa-vyutpattyārpaṇaṃ juhvādi mantrādi ca |
GE07bhg4c04u:1211: evam arpyate 'smā iti vyutpattyārpaṇaṃ devatā-rūpaṃ sampradānam |
GE07bhg4c04u:1212: evam arpyate 'sminn iti vyutpattyārpaṇam adhikaraṇaṃ deśa-kālādi |
GE07bhg4c04u:1213: tat sarvaṃ brahmaṇi kalpitatvād brahmaiva rajju-kalpita-bhujaṅgavad
GE07bhg4c04u:1216: sākṣāt karma kārakaṃ tad api brahmaiva |
GE07bhg4c04u:1220: tathā yena kartrā yajamānenādhvaryuṇā ca tyajyate prakṣipyate ca tad ubhayam api kartṛ-kārakaṃ kartari vihitayā tṛtīyayānūdya brahmeti nidhīyae brahmaṇeti
GE07bhg4c04u:1221: | evaṃ hutam iti havanaṃ tyāga-kriyā prakṣepa-kriyā ca tad api brahmaiva |
GE07bhg4c04u:1222: tathā yena havanena yad gantavyaṃ svargādi vyavahitaṃ karma tad api brahmaiva |
GE07bhg4c04u:1224: hutam ity atrāpīta eva brahmety anuṣajyate |
GE07bhg4c04u:1225: vyavadhānābhāvāt sākāṅkṣatvāc ca cit-patis tvā punātu ity ādāv acchidreṇetyādi-para-vākya-śeṣavat
GE07bhg4c04u:1226: anena rūpeṇa karmaṇi samādhir brahma-jñānaṃ yasya sa karma-samādhis tena
GE07bhg4c04u:1227: brahma-vidā karmānuṣṭhātrāpi brahma paramānandādvayaṃ gantavyam ity anuṣajyate |
GE07bhg4c04u:1228: sākāṅkṣatvād avyavadhānāc ca yā te agne rajāśayety ādau tanūr
GE07bhg4c04u:1230: athavārpyate 'smai phalāyeti vyutpattyārpaṇa-padenaiva svargādi-phalam api grāhyam |
GE07bhg4c04u:1231: tathā ca brahmaiva tena gantavyaṃ brahma-karma-samādhinā ity uttarārdhaṃ jñāna-phala-kathanāyaiveti samañjasam |
GE07bhg4c04u:1232: asmin pakṣe brahma-karma-samādhinety ekaṃ vā padam |
GE07bhg4c04u:1233: pūrvaṃ brahma-padaṃ hutam ity anena sambadhyate caramaṃ gantavya-padeneti bhinnaṃ vā padam
GE07bhg4c04u:1237: ataeva na svargādi tuccha-phalaṃ tena gantavyaṃ vidyayāvidyaka-kāraka-vyavahārocchedāt
GE07bhg4c04u:1239: kāraka-vyavahāre hi śuddhaṃ vastu na vīkṣyate |
GE07bhg4c04u:1240: śuddhe vastuni siddhe ca kāraka-vyāvṛttiḥ kutaḥ || iti |
GE07bhg4c04u:1242: kṣipyate sampan-mātreṇa phala-viśeṣāyeti keṣāṃcid vyākhyānaṃ bhāṣyakṛdbhir
GE07bhg4c04u:1246: sa yajña eva kīdṛśaḥ ? ity apekṣāyām āha brahmeti |
GE07bhg4c04u:1250: brahmaivāgnāv iti havanādhikaraṇam agnir api brahmaiva |
GE07bhg4c04u:1253: kutaḥ ? brahmātmakaṃ yat karma tatraiva samādhiś cittaikāgryaṃ yasya tena ||24||
GE07bhg4c04u:1254: baladevaḥ : evaṃ vivikta-jīvātmānusandhi-garbhatayā sva-vihitasya karmaṇo jñānākāratām abhidhāya sāṅgasya tasya parātma-rūpatānusandhinā
GE07bhg4c04u:1256: arpyate 'nenātmaiveti vyutpatter arpaṇaṃ sruvaṃ mantrādhidaivataṃ cendrādi tat tac ca brahmaiva
GE07bhg4c04u:1257: arpyamāṇaṃ haviś cājyādi tad api brahmaiva |
GE07bhg4c04u:1259: brahmaṇi yajamānenādhvaryuṇā ca brahmaṇā hutaṃ tyaktaṃ prakṣiptaṃ ca |
GE07bhg4c04u:1263: na ca samastaṃ padam iti vācyam |
GE07bhg4c04u:1265: brahma-dṛṣṭer vidheyatvād itthaṃ ca brahma-rūpe sāṅge karmaṇi samādhiś
GE07bhg4c04u:1266: cittaikāgryaṃ yasya tena mumukṣuṇā brahmaiva gantavyaṃ sva-svarūpaṃ
GE07bhg4c04u:1267: para-svarūpaṃ ca labhyam avalokyam ity arthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c04u:1268: vijñānaṃ brahma ced veda ity ādau jīve brahma-śabdaḥ |
GE07bhg4c04u:1269: vijñānam ānandaṃ brahma ity ādau paramātmani ca brahmārpaṇatvādi-guṇa-yogān nāsya prakaraṇasya paunaruktam |
GE07bhg4c04u:1270: sruv-ādīnāṃ brahmatvaṃ tad-āyatta-vṛttikatvāt tad-vāpyatvāc ca iti vyākhyātāraḥ |
GE07bhg4c04u:1276: śrīdharaḥ : etad eva yajñatvena sampāditaṃ sarvatra brahma-darśana-lakṣaṇaṃ jñānaṃ sarva-yajñopāya-prāpyatvāt
GE07bhg4c04u:1277: śreṣṭham ity evaṃ stotum adhikāri-bhedena jñānopāya-bhūtān bahūn yajñān āha daivam ity ādibhir aṣṭabhiḥ |
GE07bhg4c04u:1280: taṃ daivam eva yajñam apare karma-yoginaḥ paryupāsate śraddhayānutiṣṭhanti |
GE07bhg4c04u:1281: apare tu jñāna-yogino brahma-rūpe 'gnau apare yajñenaivopāyena brahmārpaṇam ity ādy ukta-prakāreṇa yajñam upajuhvati |
GE07bhg4c04u:1285: brahmārpaṇa-mantre sthite punar api tasya stuty-artham itarāny ajñān upanyasyati daivam iti |
GE07bhg4c04u:1286: devā indrāgny-ādaya ijyante yena sa daivas tam eva yajñaṃ darśa-pūrṇamāsa-jyotiṣṭomādi-rūpam apare yoginaḥ paryupāsate
GE07bhg4c04u:1289: uktvāntaḥ-karaṇa-śuddhi-dvāreṇa tat-phala-bhūtaṃ jñāna-yajñam āha brahmāgnau satya-jñānānantānanda-rūpaṃ nirasta-samasta-viśeṣaṃ brahma
GE07bhg4c04u:1290: tat-padārthas tasminn agnau yajñaṃ pratyag ātmānaṃ tva-padārthaṃ
GE07bhg4c04u:1299: paṭhyate śreyān dravya-mayād yajñāj jñāna-yajñaa ity ādinā stotum ||25||
GE07bhg4c04u:1300: viśvanāthaḥ : yajñāḥ khalu bhedenānye 'pi bahavo vartante |
GE07bhg4c04u:1301: tāṃs tvaṃ śṛṇv ity āha daivam evety aṣṭabhiḥ |
GE07bhg4c04u:1308: tasmiṃs tat-padārthe yajñaṃ haviḥ-sthānīyaṃ tvaṃ-padārthaṃ jīvaṃ yajñena praṇava-rūpeṇa mantreṇaiva juhvati |
GE07bhg4c04u:1310: atra yajñaṃ yajñena iti śabdau karma-karaṇa-sādhanau prathamātiśayoktyā
GE07bhg4c04u:1312: baladevaḥ : evaṃ brahmānusandhi-garbhatayā ca karmaṇo jñānākāratāṃ nirūpya
GE07bhg4c04u:1314: daivam indrādi-devārcana-rūpaṃ yajñam apare yoginaḥ paryupāsate tatraiva niṣṭhāṃ kurvanti
GE07bhg4c04u:1315: apare brahmārpaṇaṃ ity ādi-nyāyena brahma-bhūtāgnāv yajñena sruvādinā yajñaṃ
GE07bhg4c04u:1316: ghṛtādi-havī-rūpaṃ juhvati homa eva niṣṭhāṃ kurvatīty arthaḥ ||25||
GE07bhg4c04u:1327: anāsaktāḥ santo 'gnitvena bhāviteṣv indriyeṣu haviṣṭvena bhāvitān śabdādīn prakṣipantīty arthaḥ ||26||
GE07bhg4c04u:1328: madhusūdanaḥ : śrotrādīnīndriyāṇy anye saṃyamāgniṣu juhvati śabdādīn viṣayān anya indriyāgniṣu juhvati ||26||
GE07bhg4c04u:1330: saṃyamaḥ saṃyataṃ mana evāgnayas teṣu juhvati |
GE07bhg4c04u:1332: anye tato nyūnā brahmacāriṇaḥ śabdādīn viṣayāni indriyāgniṣv indriyāṇy evāgnayas teṣu juhvati śabdādīnīndriyeṣu pravilāpayantīty arthaḥ ||26||
GE07bhg4c04u:1334: tat-tad-ndriya-saṃyama-rūpeṣv agniṣu śrotrādīni juhvati tāni nirudhya saṃyama-pradhānās tiṣṭhanti |
GE07bhg4c04u:1335: anye gṛhiṇa indriyāgniṣv agnitvena bhāviteṣu śrotrādiṣu śabdādīn upajuhvati anāsaktyā tān bhuñjānās tāni tat-pravaṇāni
GE07bhg4c04u:1351: udgāre nāga ākhyātaḥ kūrmas tūnmīlane smṛtaḥ |
GE07bhg4c04u:1353: na jahāti mṛte kvāpi sarvavyāpī dhanaṃjayaḥ || [Gheraṇḍa-saṃhitā 5.64|
GE07bhg4c04u:1358: tasmin jñānena dhyeya-viṣayeṇa dīpite prajvalite dhyeyaṃ
GE07bhg4c04u:1359: samyag jñātvā tasmin manaḥ saṃyamya tāni sarvāṇi karmāṇy uparamayantīty arthaḥ ||27||
GE07bhg4c04u:1377: udgāre nāga ākhyātaḥ kūrmas tūnmīlane smṛtaḥ |
GE07bhg4c04u:1379: na jahāti mṛte kvāpi sarvavyāpī dhanaṃjayaḥ || [Gheraṇḍa-saṃhitā 5.64|
GE07bhg4c04u:1381: ātmanas tvaṃ-padārthasya saṃyamaḥ śuddhir evāgnis tasmin juhvati |
GE07bhg4c04u:1383: ekaḥ pratyag ātmaivāsti, nānye mana ādāya iti bhāvayantīty arthaḥ ||27||
GE07bhg4c04u:1387: ātmano manasaḥ saṃyamaḥ sa eva yogas tasminn agnitvena bhāvite juhvati |
GE07bhg4c04u:1401: kṛcchra-cāndrāyaṇādi tapa eva yajño yeṣāṃ te eva yajño yeṣāṃ te tapo-yajñāḥ |
GE07bhg4c04u:1402: yogo 'ṣṭāṅga eva yajño yeṣāṃ te yoga-yajñāḥ |
GE07bhg4c04u:1403: svādhyāyena vedena śravaṇa-mananādinā yat tad artha-jñānaṃ tad eva yajño
GE07bhg4c04u:1408: samyak śitaṃ tīkṣṇīkṛtaṃ vrataṃ yeṣāṃ te ||28||
GE07bhg4c04u:1411: viśvanāthaḥ : dravya-dānam eva yajño yeṣāṃ te dravya-yajñāḥ |
GE07bhg4c04u:1413: kṛcchra-cāndrāyaṇādy eva yajño yeṣāṃ te tapo-yajñāḥ |
GE07bhg4c04u:1414: yogo 'ṣṭāṅga eva yajño yeṣāṃ te yoga-yajñāḥ |
GE07bhg4c04u:1415: svādhyāyo vedasya pāṭhas tad-arthasya jñānaṃ ca yajño yeṣāṃ te |
GE07bhg4c04u:1417: sarva ete samyak śitaṃ tīkṣṇīkṛtaṃ vrataṃ yeṣāṃ te ||28||
GE07bhg4c04u:1432: tathā kumbhakena prāṇāpānayor ūrdhvādho-gatī ruddhvā recaka-kāle 'pānaṃ prāṇe juhvati |
GE07bhg4c04u:1433: evaṃ pūraka-kumbhaka-recakaiḥ prāṇāyāma-parāyaṇā apara ity arthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c04u:1435: apare tv āhāra-saṅkocam abhyasyantaḥ svayam eva jīryamāṇeṣv indriyeṣu tat-tad-indriya-vṛtti-layaṃ bhāvayantīty arthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c04u:1436: yad vā - apāne juhvati prāṇaṃ prāṇe 'pānaṃ tathāpara ity anena
GE07bhg4c04u:1437: pūraka-recakayor āvartamānayor haṃsaḥ so 'ham ity anulomataḥ pratilomataś
GE07bhg4c04u:1438: ca abhivyajyamānenājapā-mantreṇa tat-ttvaṃ-padārthaikyaṃ vyatīhāreṇa bhāvayantīty arthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c04u:1440: sa-kāreṇa bahir yāti haṃ-kāreṇa viśet punaḥ |
GE07bhg4c04u:1441: prāṇas tatra sa evāhaṃ haṃsa ity anucintayet || iti |
GE07bhg4c04u:1442: prāṇāpāna-gatī ruddhvety anena tu ślokena prāṇāyāma-yajñā aparaiḥ kathyante |
GE07bhg4c04u:1443: tatrāyam arthaḥ - dvau bhāgau pūrayed annair jalenaikaṃ prapūrayet |
GE07bhg4c04u:1448: prāṇāyāma-parāyaṇāḥ santaḥ prāṇān indriyāṇi prāṇeṣu juhvati |
GE07bhg4c04u:1449: kumbhake hi sarve prāṇā ekībhavantīti tatraiva layamāneṣv indriyeṣu homaṃ bhāvayantīty arthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c04u:1451: yathā yathā sadābhyāsān manasaḥ sthiratā bhavet |
GE07bhg4c04u:1452: vāyu-vāk-kāya-dṛṣṭīnāṃ sthiratā ca tathā tathā || iti ||29||
GE07bhg4c04u:1453: madhusūdanaḥ : apāne juhvati prāṇaṃ prāṇe 'pānaṃ tathāpare prāṇāpāna-gatī
GE07bhg4c04u:1462: niyatāhārā alpāhārāḥ prāṇeṣv āhāra-saṅkocanenaiva jīvyamāneṣu prāṇān indriyāṇi
GE07bhg4c04u:1464: indriyāṇāṃ prāṇādhīna-vṛttitvāt prāṇa-daurbalye sati svayam eva
GE07bhg4c04u:1474: āntarasya vāyor nāsāsyena bahir nirgamaḥ śvāsaḥ prāṇasya gatiḥ |
GE07bhg4c04u:1477: tayor nirodhaḥ kumbhakaḥ sa dvividhaḥ vāyum āpūrya
GE07bhg4c04u:1479: vāyuṃ virecya tayor nirodho bhaiḥ kumbhakaḥ |
GE07bhg4c04u:1480: apare nityatāhārāḥ bhojana-saṅkocaam abhyasyantaḥ prāṇān indriyāṇi prāṇeṣu juhvati |
GE07bhg4c04u:1487: śrīdharaḥ : tad evam uktānāṃ dvādaśānāṃ yajña-vidāṃ phalam āha sarve 'pīti
GE07bhg4c04u:1490: yajñaiḥ kṣayitaṃ nāśitaṃ kalmaṣaṃ yais te ||30||
GE07bhg4c04u:1491: madhusūdanaḥ : tad evam uktānāṃ dvādaśadhā yajña-vidāṃ phalam āha sarve
GE07bhg4c04u:1493: yajñān vidanti jānanti vindanti labhante veti yajña-vido yajñānāṃ jñātāraḥ kartāraś ca |
GE07bhg4c04u:1494: yajñaiḥ pūrvoktaiḥ kṣapitaṃ nāśitaṃ kalmaṣaṃ pāpaṃ yeṣāṃ te yajña-kṣapita-kalmaṣāḥ |
GE07bhg4c04u:1498: sattva-śuddhi-jñāna-prāpti-dvāreṇa yānti brahma sanātanaṃ nityaṃ saṃsārān mucyanta ity arthaḥ ||30||
GE07bhg4c04u:1499: viśvanāthaḥ : sarve 'py ete yajña-vida ukta-lakṣaṇān yajñān vindamānāḥ santo jñāna-dvārā brahma yānti |
GE07bhg4c04u:1501: yajñāvaśiṣṭaṃ yad amṛtaṃ bhogaiśvarya-siddhy-ādikaṃ tad bhuñjata iti
GE07bhg4c04u:1502: baladevaḥ : ete khalv indirya-vijaya-kāmāḥ sarve 'pīti yajña-vidaḥ |
GE07bhg4c04u:1503: pūrvoktān devādi-yajñān vindamānā tair eva yajñaiḥ kṣapita-kalmaṣāḥ ||30||
GE07bhg4c04u:1510: te sanātanaṃ nityaṃ brahma jñāna-dvāreṇa prāpnuvanti |
GE07bhg4c04u:1516: ato yajñāḥ sarvathā kartavyā ity arthaḥ
GE07bhg4c04u:1517: madhusūdanaḥ : evam anvaye guṇam uktvā vyatireke doṣam āha yejñety ardhena
GE07bhg4c04u:1518: | uktānāṃ yajñānāṃ madhye 'nyatamo 'pi yajño yasya nāsti so 'yajñas
GE07bhg4c04u:1522: viśvanāthaḥ : tathānusaṃhitaṃ phalam āha brahma yāntīti |
GE07bhg4c04u:1529: yajña-śiṣṭaṃ yad amṛtam annādi bhogaiśvarya-siddhy-ādi ca tad-bhuñjānāḥ |
GE07bhg4c04u:1533: evaṃ bahu-vidhā yajñā vitatā brahmaṇo mukhe |
GE07bhg4c04u:1534: karmajān viddhi tān sarvān evaṃ jñātvā vimokṣyase ||32||
GE07bhg4c04u:1535: śrīdharaḥ : jñāna-yajñaṃ stotum uktān yajñān upasaṃharati evaṃ bahu-vidhā iti |
GE07bhg4c04u:1542: evaṃ jñātvā jñāna-niṣṭhaḥ san saṃsārād vimukto bhaviṣyasi ||32||
GE07bhg4c04u:1543: madhusūdanaḥ : kiṃ tvayā svotprekṣā-mātreṇaivam ucyate na hi veda evātra pramāṇam ity āha evam iti |
GE07bhg4c04u:1545: sarva-vaidika-śreyaḥ-sādhana-rūpā vitatā vistṛtā brahmaṇo vedasya mukhe dvāre veda-dvāreṇaivaite 'vagatā ity arthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c04u:1548: viddhi jānīhi tān sarvān yajñān nātmajān |
GE07bhg4c04u:1550: tad-vyāpārā ete kintu nirvyāpāro 'ham udāsīna ity evaṃ jñātvā vimokṣyase 'smāt saṃsāra-bandhanād iti śeṣaḥ ||32||
GE07bhg4c04u:1551: viśvanāthaḥ : brahmaṇo vedasya mukhena vedena svamukhenaiva spaṣṭam uktā ity arthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c04u:1564: śrīdharaḥ : karma-yajñāj jñāna-yajñas tu śreṣṭha ity āha śreyān iti |
GE07bhg4c04u:1565: dravya-mayād anātma-vyāpāra-janyād daivādi-yajñāj jñāna-yajñaḥ śreyān śreṣṭhaḥ |
GE07bhg4c04u:1566: yadyapi jñāna-yajñasyāpi mano-vyāpārādhīnatvam asty eva tathāpy
GE07bhg4c04u:1570: śreṣṭhatve hetuḥ -- sarvaṃ karmākhilaṃ phala-sahitaṃ jñāne parisamāpyate |

GE07bhg4c04u:1869: nānā-vādināṃ paraspara-vipratipattiṃ dṛṣṭvā na kvāpi viśvastaḥ |
GE07bhg4c04u:1870: śraddhāvattve 'pi saṃśayātmā mamaitat sidhyen na veti sandehākrānt-matiḥ |
GE07bhg4c04u:1871: teṣv api madhye saṃśayātmānaṃ viśeṣato nindati nāyam iti ||40||
GE07bhg4c04u:1872: baladevaḥ : jñānādhikāriṇaṃ tat-phalaṃ cābhidhāya tad-viparītaṃ tat-phalaṃ
GE07bhg4c04u:1876: śāstra-jñāne saty api vivādi-pratipattibhir na kvāpi viśvastaḥ,
GE07bhg4c04u:1877: śraddadhānatve 'pi saṃśayātmā mamaitat siddhyen na veti sandihāna-manā
GE07bhg4c04u:1879: teṣv api madhye saṃśayātmānaṃ vinindati nāyam iti |
GE07bhg4c04u:1880: ayaṃ prākṛto lokaḥ paro 'prākṛtaḥ saṃśayātmanaḥ kiṃcid api
GE07bhg4c04u:1882: śāstrīya-karma-janyaṃ hi sukhaṃ, tac ca karma
GE07bhg4c04u:1884: tatra sandihānasya kutas tad ity arthaḥ ||40||
GE07bhg4c04u:1891: parameśvarārādhana-rūpeṇa tasmin saṃnyastāni karmāṇi yena taṃ karmāṇi
GE07bhg4c04u:1893: tataś ca jñānena ātma-bodhena kartrā saṃchinnaḥ saṃsāro dehādy-atimāna-lakṣaṇo yasya tam ātmavantam apramādinaṃ karmāṇi loka-saṅgrahārthāni svātāvikāni vā na nibadhnanti ||41||
GE07bhg4c04u:1900: yad vā paramārtha-darśana-lakṣaṇena yogena saṃnyastāni tyaktāni karmāṇi yena taṃ yoga-saṃnyasta-karmāṇam
GE07bhg4c04u:1901: saṃśaye sati kathaṃ yoga-saṃnyasta-karmatvam ata āha jñāna-saṃchinna-saṃśayaṃ
GE07bhg4c04u:1903: viṣaya-para-vaśatva-svarūpa-prasāde sati kuto jñānotpattir ity ata āha
GE07bhg4c04u:1905: etādṛśam apramāditvena jñānavantaṃ jñāna-saṃchinna-saṃśayatvena yoga-saṃnyasta-karmāṇaṃ karmāṇi
GE07bhg4c04u:1906: loka-saṅgrahārthāni vṛthā-ceṣṭā-rūpāṇi vā na nibadhnanti aniṣṭam iṣṭaṃ miśraṃ vā śarīraṃ nārabhante he dhanaṃjaya ||41||
GE07bhg4c04u:1907: viśvanāthaḥ : naiṣkarmyaṃ tv etādṛśasya syād ity āha yogān
GE07bhg4c04u:1912: baladevaḥ : īdṛśasya naiṣkarmya-lakṣaṇā siddhiḥ syād ity āha yogeti |
GE07bhg4c04u:1913: yogena yoga-sthaḥ kuru karmāṇi ity atroktena saṃnyastāni jñānākāratāpannāni karmāṇi yasya tam |
GE07bhg4c04u:1923: hṛdi-sthitam enaṃ saṃśayaṃ śokādi-nimittaṃ dehātma-viveka-khaḍgena chittvā
GE07bhg4c04u:1926: he bhārateti kṣatriyatvena yuddhasya dharmatvaṃ darśitam ||42||
GE07bhg4c04u:1928: niṣṭhoktā yena taṃ vande śauriṃ saṃśaya-saṃchidam ||
GE07bhg4c04u:1931: madhusūdanaḥ : tasmād ajñāna-saṃbhūtaṃ hṛt-sthaṃ jñānāsinātmanaḥ chittvainaṃ saṃśayaṃ yogam ātiṣṭhottiṣṭha bhārata ||42|| iti
GE07bhg4c04u:1936: hṛt-sthaṃ hṛd-gataṃ saṃśayaṃ chittvā yogaṃ niṣkāma-karma-yogam ātiṣṭhāśraya |
GE07bhg4c04u:1941: gītāsv ayaṃ caturtho hi saṅgataḥ saṅgataḥ satām ||4||
GE07bhg4c04u:1944: mad-upadiṣṭena jñānāsinā chittvā yogaṃ niṣkāmaṃ karma mayopadiṣṭam ātiṣṭha
GE07bhg4c04u:1946: dvy-aṃśakaṃ dhānyavat karma tuṣāṃśād iva taṇḍulaḥ |
GE07bhg4c04u:1947: śreṣṭhaṃ dravyāṃśato jñānam iti turyasya nirṇayaḥ ||4||
